sentences.english: Snow white tried in vain to please her step-mother.
sentences.chinese: 白雪公主嘗試取悅後母是徒勞的。

sentences.english: Inwardly, I wanted to please him, but I was who I was.
sentences.chinese: 內心深處，我試圖取悅他，但我還是那一個我。

sentences.english: The censors eviscerated the book to make it inoffensive to the President.
sentences.chinese: 審查員刪去了該書的精華以取悅於總統。

sentences.english: FIND FREEDOM through seeking to please Me above all else.
sentences.chinese: 追求把任何事放下去取悅我，這樣能找到自由。

sentences.english: What someone else thinks is urgent can create a sense of people-pleasing induced panic.
sentences.chinese: 有些人認爲是緊急會造成一種取悅人的感覺引起恐慌。

sentences.english: Just be thankful that his intention is to please you in the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 只要明白他的意願是要在牀上取悅於你而已。

sentences.english: This week, the planets blow the whistle on that people-pleasing behavior.
sentences.chinese: 這周的星象預示着一些取悅他人的行爲。

sentences.english: The firm may take you in just to please your father.
sentences.chinese: 本公司可能爲取悅你父親而招你進來。

sentences.english: An ex is flirting, do not entertain them please.
sentences.chinese: 你的前任開始賣弄風情，千萬別取悅他們。

sentences.english: A strict taskmaster may be difficult, but you're up to the challenge.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格的導師可能難以取悅，但你應付得來。

sentences.english: To seek favor or attention by flattery and obsequious behavior .
sentences.chinese: 用拍馬屁和諂媚的態度來取悅，引起注意。

sentences.english: But that doesn't mean Google will neuter itself to please the government.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這並不意味着谷歌要閹割自己以取悅政府。

sentences.english: You'd lose yourself in the process of being a people-pleaser and there'd be nothing unique left.
sentences.chinese: 就會在取悅別人中丟掉自我，喪失獨一無二的自己。

sentences.english: But Ferguson wonders exactly who those hard-to-please fans have in mind as a potential replacement.
sentences.chinese: 但爵爺擔心難以取悅的球迷在想換掉溫格。

sentences.english: Our goal is to please customers, to service the society and realize the self-value .
sentences.chinese: 我們的目標是取悅顧客，服務社會和實現自我價值。

definition: to get the desired outcome/to win favor by fawning on sb/to curry favor with/a fruitful outcome to reward one's labor
to persuade/to convince/to talk sb over/Taiwan pr. [shui4 fu2]
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
to haggle over every ounce/(fig.) to fuss over minor matters/to split hairs
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
to show respect from a distance (idiom)/to remain at a respectful distance
